original_text: This terrified them and they asked, “What have you done?” (They knew he was running away from the Lord, because he had already told them so.)
korean_text: 자기가 여호와의 얼굴을 피함인 줄을 그들에게 말하였으므로 무리가 알고 심히 두려워하여 이르되 네가 어찌하여 그렇게 행하였느냐 하니라

sentences.original_text: They knew he was running away from the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그가 주님께서 도망하고 있다는 것을 알았다

sentences.original_text: because he had already told them so
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그가 이미 그들에게 그렇게 말했기 때문이다
